title: Kidnap mum Karen Matthews breaks cover to shop with pals and drink coffee after harrowing The Moorside finale
text:

Karen Matthews has broken her cover following this week’s harrowing finale of The Moorside , to meet her Bible group for coffee and browse the shops. 
The 41-year-old - often dubbed the most hated mother in Britain - has been pictured for the first time since BBC aired the finale of its gripping and shocking dramatisation based on Karen’s twisted plan to kidnap her own daughter Shannon. 
Cutting a lonely figure in the rain, Karen appeared to be sporting a heavily tanned face, which was in stark contrast to her pale hands; perhaps the result of fake tanning lotion. 
She clutched a pale blue umbrella and a shopping bag, and kept bundled up in a black coat, hiding underneath its furry trimmed hood. Karen's face looked far more tanned than her hands (Photo: FameFlynet) The 41-year-old is often dubbed the most hated mother in Britain (Photo: FameFlynet) Read More 'I believed Karen Matthews' story - the woman I met was hardly a criminal mastermind', by the reporter who interviewed her 
Karen was pictured browsing the shops - despite the mum-of-seven’s notoriety leaving her unable to get a job and her claims she is trying to survive on just £25 a week in benefits. 
She was also seen meeting with her Bible group at a coffee shop, after turning to God, following the crime that shocked the nation. 
Lonely Karen joined a Bible group to meet new friends after her release from jail, has become a teetotaller and prays every day in an effort to lift her spirits.
